features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新屏幕录制支持三档分辨率可调节，新增系统声音录制、视频通话美颜和风险应用提示开关，新增USB连接用户身份认证功能，优化收藏空间动效流畅性，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
新增录屏场景录制系统声音开关，视频或语音通话时，支持录制系统声音，录屏更完整，设置路径：设置>辅助功能>屏幕录制>录制系统声音。 新增录屏分辨率自定义功能，支持三挡可调节（480P/720P/1080P），随心选择对应的分辨率进行屏幕录制，录屏更清晰，设置路径：设置>辅助功能>屏幕录制>清晰度选择。
新增视频通话美颜开关，设置路径：设置>通知和状态栏>灵动胶囊>视频美颜。 微信视频通话场景下，新增灵动胶囊形态的视频美颜调级，设置路径：设置>辅助功能>音视频通话增强页面>视频通话美颜。
新增风险应用提示开关，若系统存在风险应用，关闭开关后应用不再显示风险角标。设置路径：系统管家>病毒查杀>风险提示。 (注：若无风险应用，病毒查杀中会显示“安全，请放心使用”，不显示风险提示开关)
优化收藏空间动效流畅性。
新增USB连接用户身份认证功能，在选择“传输照片”或“传输文件 / Android Auto”时，需要进行身份认证，让您的数据传输更安全。 合入安卓2024年9月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/9
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update introduces Beauty in video calls and a switch for security warnings. In this update, you can record system sound and select from three resolution levels for screen recordings. Additionally, user authentication is required when using USB connection. This release also optimizes the smoothness of motion effect in Favorites Space, and incorporates a security patch.

You can record system sound during video or voice calls as desired. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Screen recording > Record from system sound. You can select from 480P/720P/1080P for video quality in screen recordings. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Screen recording > Video quality.

You can turn on or turn off Beauty during video calls. Try it out by going to: Settings > Notifications and status bar > Magic Capsule > Beauty. You can turn on or off Beauty for video calls. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Call enhancement > Video Call Beauty.

Risk reminders can be enabled or disabled as desired. If there are risky apps, you can hide risk badges by turning off the switch. Try it out by going to System Manager > Virus scan > Risk reminders. (Note: If no risky apps are detected, "Your device is secure" will appear when you go to Virus scan, and there is no switch for Risk reminders)
Optimizes the smoothness of the motion effect in Favorites Space.

User authentication is required when using USB connection. A verification or security prompt appears when you select Transfer photos or Transfer files/Android Auto, ensuring safer data transfer. Android security patch (Sept 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/9

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
